Comment Property

CDXML Name:Comment
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_Comment
CDX Constant Value:0x0009
Data Size:CDXString
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Document
First written/read in:ChemDraw 7.0
Required?No

Description:

An arbitrary string intended to be meaningful to a user.

If this property is absent:

The comment is treated as empty ("")
